title: Episode 1: Weinstein Attacks Women, Cuba "Attacks" Diplomats 10.09.17
itunes:title: Episode 1: Weinstein Attacks Women, Cuba "Attacks" Diplomats 10.09.17
description:
In the first episode, Jack & Miles have on guest Edgar Momplaisir to discuss the attacks on Cuba with guest expert professor Mark Fenster, & more. Plus producer Anna Hossnieh comes on to talk Harvey Weinstein's history of sexual assault.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
